business.headline: Sensex, Nifty end higher despite profit booking; Infosys leads gainsThe S&P BSE Sensex rose 319.07 points to close at 83,535.35, while the NSE Nifty 50 gained 82.05 points to settle at 25,574.35. Most sectoral indices also finished in the green, led by information technology, finance and metals.

Should property be a part of your long-term investment portfolio?With prices rising and rental yields improving, more Indians are turning to property as a long-term wealth investment. But should real estate really be part of your investment portfolio? Read on to find out.
Did Lenskart's high IPO valuation leave investors with no profit?Lenskart shares listed at Rs 395 on the NSE and Rs 390 on the BSE, both below the IPO issue price of Rs 402.

Selling less, earning more: Why India's real estate is earning more from lessIn FY25, around 4.22 lakh homes were sold across the top seven cities, with a total sales value of Rs 5.59 lakh crore. In FY26, ANAROCK projects this number to rise to Rs 6.65 lakh crore.

Nykaa share price jumps nearly 7% after Q2 profit rise: Should you buy?Nykaa's parent FSN E-Commerce Ventures reported strong Q2 results, lifting the stock nearly 7%. Analysts see solid growth but warn that high valuations may limit further upside.

Gold and silver prices jump: Good time to buy or should you wait?Precious metals are shining brighter again. Gold and silver rates have jumped, driven by global cues and a softer dollar. But for buyers planning a purchase, the dilemma remains — lock in prices now or hold for a dip?

Why more insurance claims get rejected during the festive seasonMany policyholders face claim rejections during the festive season due to confusion over policy terms, missing documents, and tighter insurer scrutiny. Experts say better awareness and clear communication can prevent disputes.

Lenskart shares make dull market debut, lists at 3% below IPO priceLenskart shares made a quiet market debut on Dalal Street today, opening at Rs 390 on the BSE, down 2.98% from the issue price. On the NSE, the stock began trading at Rs 395 per share, slightly below its issue price of Rs 402.

Groww IPO allotment out today: Check status, latest GMP and listing detailsThe Groww IPO allotment is out today with investors checking status online. Strong demand met with moderate grey market premium as listing gains expected to stay limited amid market volatility.

Goldman Sachs upgrades India to overweight, expects Nifty to rally to 29,000The brokerage has now set a Nifty50 target of 29,000 by December 2026, suggesting a potential upside of about 14% from Friday's closing levels.

entertainment.headline: What happens at Salman Khan's house parties? Shehnaaz Gill spills details Shehnaaz Gill has offered fans a rare insight into Salman Khan's house parties. Dharmendra under observation, nothing to worry about: Veteran actor's team Veteran actor Dharmendra has been admitted to Mumbai's Breach Candy Hospital, but his team confirmed he is stable and recovering well. Unkill 123: Bruised yet smiling Anurag Kashyap looks deadly in first-look poster Anurag Kashyap leads the cast in Sam Anton's new film 'Unkill 123', with the first look poster introducing his character in a digital thriller.

120 Bahadur: MLA urges Rajasthan chief minister to make Farhan's film tax-free Rajasthan MLA Ravindra Singh Bhati requested the chief minister to declare Farhan Akhtar's '120 Bahadur' tax-free. The film will release in theatres on November 21.

Iconic tiger made out of waste? Kantara: Chapter 1 tiger stuns fans in viral video The viral video of the tiger sculpture from Rishab Shetty's 'Kantara: Chapter 1' has stunned fans online, as artists revealed it was built entirely from waste materials including dried banana leaves, straws, and coconut fibre.

Prabhas's Fauzi co-star Imanvi thanks actor for delicious home-cooked food. Watch Actor Imanvi has shared her appreciation for actor Prabhas after he treated her to a lavish home-cooked meal during the shoot of their period drama 'Fauzi' in Hyderabad.

Shefali Shah on turning executive producer for Delhi Crime 3, no makeup look Actor Shefali Shah has taken on the role of executive producer for 'Delhi Crime Season 3', deepening her involvement with the show. During an exclusive interaction, she also talked about her no-makeup look on the show.

Keerthy Suresh's Revolver Rita gets new release date, to hit theatres in November The action film 'Revolver Rita', featuring Keerthy Suresh in the lead role, will be released worldwide in theatres in November after previously being scheduled for August. The production is directed by JK Chandru and produced by Sudhan Sundaram and Jagadish Palanisamy.

Ssunita Ahuja on being offered Traitors 2, Bollywood Wives; talks about new projects Ssunita Ahuja, Govinda's wife, shared she has been approached for 'Traitors Season 2' and 'Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives', though nothing is confirmed yet, and expressed that she is "always ready to work." She also shared that she is currently working on a secret project and looks forward to appearing more on screen soon.

12 years on, Farhan Akhtar slams Naseeruddin Shah's Bhaag Milkha Bhaag jibe Farhan Akhtar responded to comments made by Naseeruddin Shah regarding his performance in the film 'Bhaag Milkha Bhaag'. Shah said he didn't care for Farhan's performance, adding that he didn't "work hard" on acting.

general news.headline: 4 doctors arrested in 4 days with chemicals, rifles: Face of white-collar terrorFour doctors were arrested in four days for terror activities, including possession of firearms, ricin, and ammonium nitrate, revealing a threatening trend of highly educated professionals being radicalised by international handlers.

3,200 kg bomb-making chemical seized near Delhi, rifle found in woman doctor's carFollowing the recovery of 360 kg of ammonium nitrate, an additional 2,900 kg of the explosive-making chemical was seized. Has BJP turned infiltration just into an election-season issue?Ahead of the last phase of voting for the Bihar Assembly, BJP leaders raised the issue of ghuspaitiya or infiltrators. The issue is important for Seemanchal, a region located near the Bangladesh border and with a substantial Muslim population. The BJP brings up the issue of illegal immigration only ahead of elections, doing precious nothing the rest of the time.

Student from Andhra found dead in US, family seeks aid for funeral, loan duesA 23-year-old MS graduate from Texas A&M University–Corpus Christi was found dead in the US on November 7. Rajyalakshmi Yarlagadda, who was from Karanchedu in Andhra Pradesh, was looking for a job after completing her studies. The cause of death is under investigation.
